website_summaries.verdict: High-quality powder contour palette produces a natural California glow.
pros: Highlight, contour, and blush powders apply smoothly and evenly
There are a range of matte and shimmery shades
The color payoff is amazing, and the colors blend seamlessly
Palette works together to give your skin a natural sun-kissed glow
cons: Matte highlighter can appear chalky if applied too heavily

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and for subtle everyday looks.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice summer palette. It's not terribly pigmented and it is a bit powdery, so don't wear white while you're getting ready. It's a nice mix of tones for fair to medium complexions and the size is great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems overpriced for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Is very powdery - you have to clean the drips off your cheeks when you are done with your lids
customer_reviews.author: sheryl ck

customer_reviews.title: Good quality/travel size palette
customer_reviews.text: I like this palette a lot. It’s a little smaller than I thought it would be, no big deal. Makes it great for travel. I love that it has a blush/highlight/contour etc. it’s definitely fit for fair skin. Tan-dark skin would probably not work well because the colors are on the lighter side. It’s an everyday use palette, for subtle looks not so much glam.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great make up
customer_reviews.text: Love the contour makeup!! The colors are great! I’ll never go back to using cheap cover girl again.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Nice contour and bronzer
customer_reviews.text: Dont really use the two shimmers and the box is smaller than I thought. I like the contour, matte bronzer, and blush.
customer_reviews.author: SarahLoo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it for basic and NATURAL contouring
customer_reviews.text: I had used the smash box contour kit for a few years and this is like an upgraded version. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hess

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this palette, I usually buy the Anastasia contour kit powder, but this one worked just as good. I really like the bottom white shade as well.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Setting powder doesn’t blend easily
customer_reviews.text: Highlighters are not pigmented, and the setting powder doesn’t blend easily
customer_reviews.author: Arleny

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful palette.
customer_reviews.text: I love this contour kit. Prior I used the 3 pan, (light, medium, dark) from smashbox, palette to contour and highlight. I always felt the dark was way too dark, even with all the blending in the world (I’m a nc25). However, this pallets has more choices and variety and easily blends to a seamless contoured/highlight face. The price is excellent and well worth it. I would recommend it to those in the nc25 range. Anything above nc/nw35 and I think the palette would be too light. Sorry I don’t have great pics with the Palette in use. However, I included one pic of me in “natural makeup” and light for reference.
customer_reviews.author: BS MS

customer_reviews.title: Love it..!
customer_reviews.text: This face pallette is excellent..! I think it's a little overpriced but I purchased it anyway; it contains a lot of product, so, let's say it's worth it. A little bit goes a long way, so, you must be light handed when applying it. Easy to work with and blendable. I first purchased Med - Dark by mistake and colors are too warm / deep for me (still works on my skin tone /medium though); Light - Med is perfect for me. Recommended..!
customer_reviews.author: Yanyan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product, great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it looks very nice on and blends very easily. Impressed with the quality. Would definitely purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Orr

customer_reviews.title: Great combination of colors
customer_reviews.text: This palate is a super easy way to add subtle contouring. I use it on workdays and don’t feel like my makeup is overdone. It’s lightweight powder, but doesn’t feel thick.
customer_reviews.author: Reads-a-Lot

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the colors do not set well on your face. The highlighter is the best part about the Pallet.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Still using dollar store brand?
customer_reviews.text: You don't realize how easy contouring should be until you use a decent quality palette! I will never go back to cheap garbage. The only thing I didn't care for is that the lightest color is barely lighter than my foundation and is really flat matte. The darkest color is a bit dark for me but I'm used to that as I'm really fair. Since this picture I've discovered illuminator which makes up for the lack of lighter highlighter.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S

product_meta.title: Smashbox The Cali Contour (Shape/Bronze/Glow) Pallet 0.69 Ounce
product_meta.description: This laid-back makeup palette makes it easy to add warmth and dimension. Customize your signature Cali glow using 6 neutrals, including 2 of Smashbox's best-selling contour shades. This easy-to-use, 6-well contour palette is pigment packed with blendable highlighter, bronzer and blush powders. Use these versatile shades to create an effortlessly lifted neutral look or a warm, just-cruised-down-the-coast glow.
feature_bullets: Features 3 matte + 2 pearlescent powders to shape, bronze & highlight
Includes 1 matte blush for adding a youthful flush of subtle color

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
